mapper.insert: MERGE INTO card_upload USING DUAL ON (userNo = #{userNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET c_original = #{cOriginal}, c_change = #{cChange}, c_filepath = #{cFilePath}, c_filesize = #{cFileSize}, c_fileupdate = #{cFileUpdate} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (c_file_No, userNo, c_original, c_change, c_filepath, c_filesize, c_fileupdate) VALUES (CARD_UPLOAD_SEQ.nextval,#{userNo},#{cOriginal},#{cChange}, #{cFilePath},#{cFileSize},#{cFileUpdate})
